original_text: The high places, however, were not taken away; the people had not yet set their hearts upon the God of their fathers.
korean_text: 산당만은 철거하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 여전히 마음을 정하여 그들의 조상들의 하나님께로 돌아오지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: The high places, however, were not taken away
the people had not yet set their hearts
upon the God of their fathers
